VASSAL.tools.io

Interface FileArchive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZipArchive

    public interface FileArchive
extends java.io.Closeable
    Since:
    3.2.0
